content: Then I turned and raised my eyes, and saw there a flying scroll.
And he said to me, “What do you see?”So I answered, “I see a flying scroll. Its length  twenty cubits and its width ten cubits.”

Then he said to me, “This  the curse that goes out over the face of the whole earth: ‘Every thief shall be expelled,’ according  this side of  and, ‘Every perjurer shall be expelled,’ according  that side of it.”
Vision of the Woman in a Basket
Then the angel who talked with me came out and said to me, “Lift your eyes now, and see what this  that goes forth.”
So I asked, “What  it?” And he said, “It  a basket that is going forth.”He also said, “This  their resemblance throughout the earth:
Here  a lead disc lifted up, and this  a woman sitting inside the basket”;
then he said, “This  Wickedness!” And he thrust her down into the basket, and threw the lead cover over its mouth.
Then I raised my eyes and looked, and there  two women, coming with the wind in their wings; for they had wings like the wings of a stork, and they lifted up the basket between earth and heaven.
So I said to the angel who talked with me, “Where are they carrying the basket?”
And he said to me, “To build a house for it in the land of Shinar; when it is ready,  will be set there on its base.”
